nodes.bodyText: I think this class is small enough just to be a class inside ConfigMigrator.java

I prefer not using the logger in teh startup sequence, because most of it doesn't and if some does use it, it jumps all over with different indentation.
The other one above can probably be a debug message, I glazed over that one.
I think this has the possibility of being recursive since Object.equals() internally calls .equals(). At the least it's a useless call.
It's calling it on the field “version” not the object itself.
